summary: Save all the jokes you're gonna make, while I see how much drink I can take, then be my mistake
title: Save all the jokes you're gonna make, while I see how much drink I can take, then be my mistake
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2A0YEOa

by Kon_is_here

The wedding day is supposed to be one of the happiest moments of someone’s life.

But for Dan, it was only the start of the downfall.

blog.name: phandomwatch
blog.title: Phandom Watch Fest
blog.description:
Get your seats comfy and your snacks ready as we explore the wonderful world of Dan & Phil! 
Interested? Visit our "Show Info" page to know how we do it or follow us on twitter for more updates!

summary: Aaand the 🎄☃️Festive Phandom Watch Fest☃️🎄 has come to a close...   Thank you everyone for hanging out! We'll see you guys again...
body:
Aaand the 🎄☃️Festive Phandom Watch Fest☃️🎄 has come to a close…  

Thank you everyone for hanging out! We’ll see you guys again next time! Don’t forget to check out our IDB thread for more bants. 

See you guys again next time!

reblog.comment:

blog.name: phantasticlizzy
blog.title: king of brilliant shining foreheads
blog.description: Lizzy | 23 | she/her | if you want to read my phanfics just search the tag "phantasticlizzyfics" on tumblr or Lizzyboo on ao3

tags: this is not an invitation for 100 hate anons telling me I'm gross for writing fics haha
this is just my opinion on the matter
summary: Been reading really angsty DNP fics recently (ones that deal with one or both dealing with past traumas) and kind of want to...
question: Been reading really angsty DNP fics recently (ones that deal with one or both dealing with past traumas) and kind of want to write one. But recently I've felt weird about writing fanfiction of them bc I imagine dnp reading my stories and being upset by them. And I've been questioning my own ethics in regards to RPF. (Not saying it's bad, I still read it a lot and love it, but am I ok with writing it).
answer:
It’s a question you have to answer yourself hun, I can’t tell you what you are or aren’t comfortable with.

I think it’s important to remember though that dnp said themselves that they don’t care if we write about them, love it even. They won’t read your fics and be upset by them because quite frankly they just won’t read them at all 😅 if they decide to actively seek out fics, well then… That’s on them. They’re big boys and I don’t think it something that should bother you ☺️ but of course, to each their own comfort level!

reblog.comment:
It’s a question you have to answer yourself hun, I can’t tell you what you are or aren’t comfortable with.

I think it’s important to remember though that dnp said themselves that they don’t care if we write about them, love it even. They won’t read your fics and be upset by them because quite frankly they just won’t read them at all 😅 if they decide to actively seek out fics, well then… That’s on them. They’re big boys and I don’t think it something that should bother you ☺️ but of course, to each their own comfort level!

trail.content_raw:
It’s a question you have to answer yourself hun, I can’t tell you what you are or aren’t comfortable with.

I think it’s important to remember though that dnp said themselves that they don’t care if we write about them, love it even. They won’t read your fics and be upset by them because quite frankly they just won’t read them at all 😅 if they decide to actively seek out fics, well then… That’s on them. They’re big boys and I don’t think it something that should bother you ☺️ but of course, to each their own comfort level!
trail.content:
It’s a question you have to answer yourself hun, I can’t tell you what you are or aren’t comfortable with.

I think it’s important to remember though that dnp said themselves that they don’t care if we write about them, love it even. blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: I disagree with stan culture being toxic. I think saying your a stan is an exageration (it´s more of a joke than an actual fact...
question: I disagree with stan culture being toxic. I think saying your a stan is an exageration (it´s more of a joke than an actual fact about you being a stalker.) I think that as long as the fandom that your in is not toxic, than it´s is easy to stay a not toxic stan, I do however think that the phandom is toxic and that phandom culture is toxic. It really just depends on whether or not your actually a stalker or just a dedicated fan.
answer: Idk man, just be a fan of whatever or whoever and don’t be weird about it. It’s not that hard, you know?

reblog.comment: Idk man, just be a fan of whatever or whoever and don’t be weird about it. It’s not that hard, you know?

trail.content_raw: Idk man, just be a fan of whatever or whoever and don’t be weird about it. It’s not that hard, you know?
trail.content: Idk man, just be a fan of whatever or whoever and don’t be weird about it. It’s not that hard, you know?
